enable_lvgl.help: Enables lvgl features of the drivers (if you just want to use the drivers without lvgl, you can save build time by setting this to 0)

horizontal_res.help: The horizontal resolution of your display

vertical_res.help: The vertical resolution of your display

vdb_size.help: Configure the size of the virtual display buffer, typical is ~1/10 of screen

inv_fifo_size.help: The average count of objects on the screen

input_device_read_period.help: Input device read period in milliseconds

input_device_drag_throw.help: Drag throw slow-down in %. Greater value means faster slow-down

input_device_long_press_rep_time.help: Repeated trigger period in long press (ms)

transparent_color.help: Image pixels with this color will not be drawn (with chroma keying)

utf8_enabled.help: Enable UTF-8 coded Unicode character usage

enable_real_draw.help: Enable drawing directly to the frame buffer instead of VDB (required if vdb_size = 0)

enable_filesystem.help: Enable file system support (required by images)

use_lv_font_dejavu_10.help: Enable dejavu 10 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_10_latin_sup.help: Enable dejavu 10 latin supplemental font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_10_cyrillic.help: Enable dejavu 10 cyrillic font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_symbol_10.help: Enable symbol 10 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_20.help: Enable dejavu 20 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_20_latin_sup.help: Enable dejavu 20 latin supplemental font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_20_cyrillic.help: Enable dejavu 20 cyrillic font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_symbol_20.help: Enable symbol 20 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_30.help: Enable dejavu 30 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_30_latin_sup.help: Enable dejavu 30 latin supplemental font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_30_cyrillic.help: Enable dejavu 30 cyrillic font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_symbol_30.help: Enable symbol 30 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_40.help: Enable dejavu 40 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_40_latin_sup.help: Enable dejavu 40 latin supplemental font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_dejavu_40_cyrillic.help: Enable dejavu 40 cyrillic font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

use_lv_font_symbol_40.help: Enable symbol 40 font. Value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8 (specifies bit depth for each pixel)

enable_message_box.help: Enable message boxes (requires lv_rect, lv_btnm, lv_label)

enable_dropdown_list.help: Enable drop down lists (requires lv_page, lv_label)
